pokepicnic_main_error_01:
Não há muito espaço para o seu Pokémon.
Não parece que você pode fazer um piquenique...
pokepicnic_main_error_02:
Suas coisas podem escorregar da mesa se tentar
fazer um piquenique em uma ladeira como esta!
pokepicnic_main_error_03:
Não há espaço suficiente para desempacotar seu
kit de piquenique e deixar seu Pokémon brincar...
pokepicnic_main_error_04:
Provavelmente é melhor não fazer um
piquenique aqui...
pokepicnic_main_error_05:
Provavelmente é melhor não fazer
piquenique próximo das pessoas...
pokepicnic_main_error_06:
[BD06:0]Your pal [trnm:1] is already hosting
a\r
picnic!\r
Head\r
there\r
and\r
join them!
pokepicnic_main_error_07: Parece que você não pode fazer um piquenique na água...
pokepicnic_main_error_08:
Você não pode preparar um piquenique enquanto
monta um Pokémon!
pokepicnic_main_set_01: É um kit de piquenique! O que você quer fazer?
pokepicnic_main_yasei_01:
[BD06:0]Whoa! Looks like a wild [pknm:1]
came\r
to\r
check\r
out\r
your picnic!
pokepicnic_main_yasei_02:
[BD06:0]Seems like the wild [pknm:1] would
like\r
to\r
stick\r
with you!\r
Will you let it join you on your adventures?
pokepicnic_main_friend_02:
[BD06:0]Looks like [trnm:1] is hosting a
picnic.\r
Want\r
to\r
join in?
pokepicnic_main_friend_04:
Ainda tem companhia! Tem certeza de que
deseja fazer as malas?
pokepicnic_main_friend_05:
[BD06:0][trnm:1] packed up their Picnic
Set,\r
so\r
that’s\r
it\r
for\r
this picnic!
pokepicnic_main_change_02: Qual toalha de mesa você deseja colocar?
pokepicnic_main_change_03: Qual garrafa de água você quer colocar?
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_02:
Uh-oh, you’ve run out of picks! You can’t make a
sandwich like this!
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_03:
Oh no, you don’t have enough ingredients to
join in the sandwich making...
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_04:
Someone else is using the table to make
sandwiches now! Let’s wait our turn.
pokepicnic_main_ride_01:
[BD06:0]There are so many Pokémon playing already that
it seems there isn’t space for\r
[pknk:0]!
pokepicnic_main_ball_03: Which ball do you want to play with?
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_05: [num1:1]/[num1:2] members of your group have joined in!
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_06:
[num1:1]/[num1:2] members of your group have joined in!
Waiting for the sandwich prep to be kicked off...
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_08:
Looks like the food prep has already begun!
You’re too late to join in this time.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_02:
There’s a Pokémon Egg inside! Do you want to
take it?
pokepicnic_main_tamago_02_02:
It’s another Pokémon Egg! Do you want to
take it?
pokepicnic_main_tamago_03:
In that case, the Egg will be sent to the academy
for someone else to care for. Is that OK?
pokepicnic_main_tamago_04: The Egg was sent to the academy!
pokepicnic_main_tamago_06:
Your Boxes are already full, so the Egg was
donated to the academy.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_07: ...Oh? There’s something else in the basket!
pokepicnic_main_tamago_09:
Doesn’t look like there’s anything more in the
basket right now.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_10:
Doesn’t look like there’s anything in the basket
so far...
